subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Manny Fernandez made 35 saves and Brian Rolston scored two goals to help the Minnesota Wild extend its franchise-best start with a 3-1 victory against the visiting Los Angeles Kings.
snippet: Manny Fernandez made 35 saves and Brian Rolston scored two goals to help the Minnesota Wild extend its franchise-best start with a 3-1 victory against the visiting Los Angeles Kings.
